name: Angeles National Forest
description: Steep terrain with dense chaparral. High wind exposure.

name: San Bernardino Mountains
description: Mountain communities surrounded by dry forest and brush.

name: Malibu & Santa Monica Mountains
description: Coastal chaparral with intense WUI exposure.

name: Riverside/Corona Foothills
description: Rapidly growing WUI at canyon mouths.

name: San Diego Backcountry
description: Hot, dry backcountry with limited access.
